info.description:
# ü§§üçΩüë®‚Äçüç≥ CookinAt Consumer API Services
Is a platform connecting diners with cooks. Upcoming versions may also include similar services such as waiters, catering, cocktails, etc.

/ping.description:
This operation shows current *status* of server.

If `200` then all ok, if `500` a problem is there.

__Dev Oriented Endpoint__

get.description: Return a list with all cook not locked: {userId, firstName, lastName, avatar, innerReview}
Return an array with all reviewes created by certain cook
User and Admin must be capable of get all dishes
Given the reservationId obtain info needed
Given the paymentId obtain info needed
Find a cook from his id
Find a dish from his id
Return a list with all payments
Return a list with all payments of a Buyer from his id
Return a list of reservation for diner
Return the list of reservations for cook

/consumer/review/all.description: Return a list with all reviews

get.description: Return a list with all reivews
Return a list of reviews from user id
Return a list de reviews from cook id
Return a list of dish from a cook id
Return a list with all payments of a Receiver from his id

attachment.description: URLs to pfotos that shows the dish greatness and gorgeous look

price.description:
It will be in the form 0000, where the last 2 digits are the cents. 
For example 1000 is equal to $10.00

promotionals_notification.description: Do you want to receive promotions, deals and offers?

error.description: reference to the aspect of the service. Acts like a title describing what portion of the service can be improved later. We plan to make it a enum later.

example.msg: An Internal Server Error found. Please try again or contact Support.

error.description: If more than an error is found, it will be on his own object.
